general.name: Ahmad Abrar
general.headline: Full Stack Developer
about: I am a Full Stack Web Developer at Ascend AI, where I design and build applications using modern technologies.
With a strong foundation in Computer Science, I have hands-on experience with React.js, Express.js, and Git, along with proficiency in JavaScript, Python, and TypeScript.

At Ascend AI, I have worked on developing SaaS products, including automated lead generation tools, driving significant user engagement. Passionate about innovation and collaboration, I thrive in Agile environments and am committed to creating impactful digital experiences.

experiences.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
experiences.description: Developed a variety of applications including web, mobile, and desktop, with a focus on integrating AI technologies. Collaborated with a team of developers to design, and develop startup level sass product, like https://clevercore.ai. Developed automated lead generation for Instagram with a total of 45 thousand successful DMs sent and over 500 active users. Like: https://www.instadm.ai/. Implemented Stripe gateway

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Worked on core functionalities such as the text editor, AI integration, and infinite scrolling. Seamlessly integrated backend and frontend systems utilizing RESTful APIs, adhering to the industry-standard MVC architecture to promote efficient data handling and long-term system maintainability.

experiences.title: Intern
experiences.description: Developed and improved user interface elements, enhancing user engagement and overall experience, applying advanced UI/UX design principles.

projects.name: Task Flow
projects.description: A simple two-column portfolio template that is easy and quick to customize for your own purposes. Mobile friendly.

projects.name: Tutor For Hire Frontend
projects.description: Front end for tutor for hire.
